001package Calibration_Demos_More;
002
003import java.awt.Color;
004import java.awt.geom.Point2D;
005
006import org.apache.commons.math3.complex.Quaternion;
007import org.apache.commons.math3.geometry.euclidean.threed.Rotation;
008
009import ij.IJ;
010import ij.ImagePlus;
011import ij.ImageStack;
012import ij.io.LogStream;
013import ij.plugin.PlugIn;
014import ij.process.ColorProcessor;
015import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
016import imagingbook.calibration.zhang.data.CalibrationImage;
017import imagingbook.calibration.zhang.data.ZhangData;
018import imagingbook.calibration.zhang.Camera;
019import imagingbook.calibration.zhang.ViewTransform;
020import imagingbook.calibration.zhang.util.GridPainter;
021import imagingbook.calibration.zhang.util.MathUtil;
022import imagingbook.common.math.PrintPrecision;
023import imagingbook.core.resource.ImageResource;
024
025/**
026 * This plugin performs interpolation of views, given a sequence
027 * of key views.
028 * Translations (3D camera positions) are interpolated linearly.
029 * Pairs of rotations are interpolated by linear mixture
030 * of the corresponding quaternion representations (see
031 * http://www.opengl-tutorial.org/intermediate-tutorials/tutorial-17-quaternions/#How_do_I_interpolate_between_2_quaternions__).
032 *
033 * @author W. Burger
034 * @version 2021-08-22
035 *
036 */
037public class Demo_View_Interpolation implements PlugIn {
038
039        private static ImageResource resource = CalibrationImage.CalibImageStack;       // = "CalibImageStack.tif"
040
041        static int NumberOfInterpolatedFrames = 10;
042        static double PeakHeightZ = -1.5;
043
044        static Color LineColor = Color.black;
045        static Color BackGroundColor = Color.white;
046        static boolean BeVerbose = false;
047
048        static {
049                LogStream.redirectSystem();
050                PrintPrecision.set(6);
051        }
052
053        public void run(String arg0) {
054                ImagePlus testIm = resource.getImagePlus();
055                if (testIm == null) {
056                        IJ.error("Could not open calibration images!"); 
057                        return;
058                }
059
060                Camera cam = ZhangData.getCameraIntrinsics();
061                Point2D[] modelPoints = ZhangData.getModelPoints();
062
063                int w = testIm.getWidth();
064                int h = testIm.getHeight();
065                int M = testIm.getNSlices();
066
067                ImageStack animation = new ImageStack(w, h);
068
069                for (int a = 0; a < M; a++) {
070                        int b = (a + 1) % M;
071                        ViewTransform viewA = ZhangData.getViewTransform(a);    // view A
072                        ViewTransform viewB = ZhangData.getViewTransform(b);    // view B
073                        if (BeVerbose)
074                                System.out.println("**** doing views " + a +"/"+ ((a + 1) % M));
075
076                        Rotation rA = viewA.getRotation();
077                        Rotation rB = viewB.getRotation();
078                        double[] tA = viewA.getTranslation();
079                        double[] tB = viewB.getTranslation();
080
081                        // interpolation step k for view pair (a,b)
082                        for (int k = 0; k < NumberOfInterpolatedFrames; k++) {
083                                double alpha = (double) k / NumberOfInterpolatedFrames;
084
085                                // interpolate rotation
086                                Rotation rk = Lerp(rA, rB, alpha);
087
088                                // interpolate translation:
089                                double[] tk = Lerp(tA, tB, alpha);
090
091                                ViewTransform viewK = new ViewTransform(rk, tk);
092                                //viewK.print();
093
094                                // Create a new frame for the interpolated view
095                                // and project the target model:
096                                ImageProcessor frame = new ColorProcessor(w, h);
097                                if (BackGroundColor != null) {
098                                        frame.setColor(BackGroundColor);
099                                        frame.fill();
100                                }
101                                projectAndDrawPyramids(frame, cam, viewK, modelPoints);
102                                String title = String.format("frame-%d-%d", a, k);
103                                animation.addSlice(title, frame);
104                        }
105                }
106
107                new ImagePlus("Animation", animation).show();
108        }
109
110        Rotation Lerp(Rotation R0, Rotation R1, double alpha) {
111                Quaternion qa = MathUtil.toQuaternion(R0);
112                Quaternion qb = MathUtil.toQuaternion(R1);
113                return MathUtil.toRotation(Lerp(qa, qb, alpha));
114        }
115
116        /**
117         * Linear quaternion interpolation (LERP)
118         * @param Q0
119         * @param Q1
120         * @param a
121         * @return
122         */
123        Quaternion Lerp(Quaternion Q0, Quaternion Q1, double a) {
124                return Quaternion.add(Q0.multiply(1 - a), Q1.multiply(a));
125        }
126
127        /**
128         * Linear translation interpolation
129         * @param t0
130         * @param t1
131         * @param a
132         * @return
133         */
134        double[] Lerp(double[] t0, double[] t1, double a) {
135                double[] t01 = t0.clone();
136                for (int i = 0; i < t01.length; i++) {
137                        t01[i] = (1 - a) * t0[i] + a * t1[i];
138                }
139                return t01;
140        }
141
142        // ----------------------------------------------------------------------
143
144        // draw pyramids instead of squares at Z = PeakHeightZ (inch)
145        void projectAndDrawPyramids(ImageProcessor ip, Camera cam, ViewTransform view, Point2D[] modelPoints) {
146                GridPainter painter = new GridPainter(ip);
147                for (int i = 0; i < modelPoints.length; i += 4) {
148                        Point2D[] modelSq = new Point2D[4];
149                        Point2D[] imageSq = new Point2D[4];
150                        // 3D points p0,...,p3 define a model square in the Z=0 plane
151                        for (int j = 0; j < 4; j++) {
152                                modelSq[j] = modelPoints[i + j];
153                                imageSq[j] = MathUtil.toPoint2D(cam.project(view, modelSq[j]));
154                        }
155                        painter.lineCol = LineColor;
156                        painter.drawSquare(imageSq);
157
158                        // make the 3D pyramid peak:
159                        double[] modelPeak3d = new double[3];
160                        modelPeak3d[0] = (modelSq[0].getX() + modelSq[2].getX()) / 2;   // X
161                        modelPeak3d[1] = (modelSq[0].getY() + modelSq[2].getY()) / 2;   // Y
162                        modelPeak3d[2] = PeakHeightZ;   // Z
163
164                        // project and draw the pyramid peak:
165                        Point2D pk = MathUtil.toPoint2D(cam.project(view, modelPeak3d));
166                        painter.drawLine(imageSq[0], pk);
167                        painter.drawLine(imageSq[1], pk);
168                        painter.drawLine(imageSq[2], pk);
169                        painter.drawLine(imageSq[3], pk);
170                }
171        }
172
173}
